data.title: The Impact of Chemical Evolution on the Observable Properties of Stellar Populations
data.meta_description: The major effects of the chemical evolution of galaxies on the characteristics of their stellar populations are reviewed. A few examples of how the observed stellar properties derived from colour-magnitude diagrams can constrain chemical evolution models are given.
